Tol Sirion was the island on the upper reaches of the River Sirion where Finrod built the tower of Minas Tirith (Beleriand)
column2: renamed Tol-in-Gaurhoth (Isle of the Werewolves) after its capture by Sauron. It was called Wizards Isle in the Lay of Leithian.
